mapper.select: select film.UUID AS filmId, film.film_status AS filmStatus, film.film_name AS filmName, info.film_en_name AS filmEnName, film.film_score AS filmScore, film.film_preSaleNum AS preSaleNum, film.film_box_office AS boxOffice, film.film_time AS filmTime, info.film_length AS filmLength, film.img_address AS mainImg from wddily_film_t film LEFT JOIN wddily_film_info_t info ON film.UUID = info.film_id

SELECT film.UUID AS filmId, film.film_name filmName, info.film_length filmLength, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(show_name SEPARATOR ',') FROM wddily_cat_dict_t cat WHERE FIND_IN_SET( cat.UUID,( SELECT REPLACE(TRIM(BOTH '#' FROM film.film_cats), "#", ",") FROM wddily_film_t f WHERE f.UUID = film.UUID ))) AS filmCats, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(role_name SEPARATOR ',') FROM wddily_film_actor_t actor WHERE actor.film_id = film.UUID) AS actors, film.img_address imgAddress, info.film_imgs subAddress FROM wddily_film_t film LEFT JOIN wddily_film_info_t info ON film.`UUID` = info.`film_id` where film.`uuid` = #{filmId}
